If you get anything out of this, just be kind.

Iâ€™ll find it and itâ€™ll kill my motivation. I have no irl person to  discuss this with so no matter how hard i try, it gets to my head. It makes me want to give up because Iâ€™m not worthy. Just donâ€™t say it.

Canâ€™t we all just show some respect. Donâ€™t we learn about respect in kindergarten? Donâ€™t we learn to keep things to yourself if they arenâ€™t good to say, if theyâ€™re hurtful? If you want to be an ass donâ€™t put it on the internet because it never leaves.

Just a boost of encouragement goes a long way. I look up to people. I aspire to get shots like many people. When someone you admire and look up to you is out there making fun of what you love and what youâ€™re proud of, it hurts. It makes me angry.

Me. Of all people. I was a nobody last year. Youâ€™ve heard of me now because I put in the work to grow. I went all out to build a brand. I went all out to build my name. Ive worked hard to get where I am. Yall were in my shoes too. Instead of being an ass, maybe you should support

I cannot get a job. I go to class, do homework and have practice. I get a little bit of free time a day. None of it pays. NFTs have helped me cover basic necessities along with a fund to chase storms. I work hard for a bunch of people to just sit there and laugh at me

To those people (you absolutely know who you are) are doing a disservice to the future of storm chasing. Why? Youâ€™re actively trying to put young chasers down for trying to pursue a dream. Chasing is not cheap.
